import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskForm=_ref=>{let{setTasks,editingTask,setEditingTask}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[dueDate,setDueDate]=useState('');const[priority,setPriority]=useState('low');const[status,setStatus]=useState('Not Started');const[categories,setCategories]=useState([]);const[alarm,setAlarm]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(editingTask){setTitle(editingTask.title);setDescription(editingTask.description);setDueDate(editingTask.dueDate);setPriority(editingTask.priority);setStatus(editingTask.status);setCategories(editingTask.categories);setAlarm(editingTask.alarm);}else{// Clear the form if no task is being edited
